title: Schools - Third Party Supply Agency Spend

content:
Dear Sheffield City Council,
I would like to know how much each Primary, Secondary and SEND school in the LEA (of which data is held) has spent on Supply Teaching or Teaching Assistant cover with external supply agency companies, and if possible how much has been spent with each of those companies per school. If this information is unavailable, then just a total spend by school.
I would like this data to cover the previous academic year from the 1st September 2023 - 31st July 2024.
Yours faithfully,
Luke

Dear Luke Beastall,
Thank you for your request for information relating to Schools - Third
Party Supply Agency Spend which we received on 13/11/2024.
This has been logged as a Freedom of Information Request and will be dealt
with under the Freedom of Information Act 2000. The reference number for
your request can be found above.
The Freedom of Information Act 2000 states that we must respond to you
within 20 working days, by 12/12/2024. Please do not hesitate to contact
us at the email address below if you have any queries.
Yours sincerely,
Sheffield City Council
PO Box 1283
Sheffield, S1 1UJ

Dear Luke Beastall,
Thank you for your request for information relating to Schools - Third
Party Supply Agency Spend which we received on 13/11/2024.
Please find Sheffield City Council’s response to your request set out
below:
We don’t have information on suppliers the schools are responsible for its
own payments, and it’s not held on the council’s finance system.  The
school accounts are consolidated into the council accounts and submitted
to the DfE and summarised to CFR (consistent financial reporting) level.
Details of individual transactions are only held within the school’s own
accounting system, so the school would have to be contacted directly for
more comprehensive information. The list of Sheffield Schools is here:
[1]Sheffield Schools list January 2024
The data being requested is for the academic year 1^st September 2023 –
31^st July 2024 and we work on financial year.  The period we could report
on is April 2023 to March 2024 as at year end we request from schools
their CFR report which goes to the DfE.  The total for Agency Supply
Teachers l for each school is available. Teaching Assistant cover comes
under the CFR heading “Bought in professional Services”, which does not
break down the cost for Teaching Assistants.
If you have any queries about this response, please do not hesitate to
contact us.
